title: Cybersecurity Scenario-Based Instructional Design: Pre-Service Teacher Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental information security concepts and instructional design principles
context.additional_context: A course focused on enhancing practical scenario development capabilities for effectively designing and delivering cybersecurity education to pre-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three cybersecurity threat scenarios that may occur in real educational settings and develop response strategies using analytical tools.
Learners can design integrated educational plans incorporating soft skills such as digital literacy and crisis communication alongside technical security measures.
Learners can improve and apply scenario-based cybersecurity training modules at least once based on peer evaluations and instructor feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
